channel.title: 508 runserver error
channel.description: I click to run server, here's error [code]java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at Bulby.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:36) at Bulby.Server.main(Server.java:43) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: 508 runserver error
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“runescaper12345, post:3, topic:354896”]just asking because thats wat mine keeps coming up with so does it really work?[/quote]I guess this could be a legitimate gravedig, better than making a new topic for the same question. But yes, your problem is that you have something else running on that port already.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 runserver error

item.description:

I click to run server, here’s error

java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at Bulby.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:36) at Bulby.Server.main(Server.java:43) Press any key to continue . . .
